subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After trying and failing to inspire his team via coddling and vitriol this season, Isiah Thomas, in his latest measure to attempt to right the Knicks’ sinking ship, has been shuffling the lineup.
snippet: After trying and failing to inspire his team via coddling and vitriol this season, Isiah Thomas, in his latest measure to attempt to right the Knicks’ sinking ship, has been shuffling the lineup.
